thread.title: Calendar for Oct. 10, 2015

title: Calendar for Oct. 10, 2015
text: Columbia Harvest Festival, Columbia State Historic Park, Parrotts Ferry Road. Sonora Farmers Market, 7:30 to 11:30 a.m., corner of Theall and Stewart streets, 532-7725. Kiwanis Club Open Air Market, 8 a.m. to 4 p.m., Mono Village Center, Mono Way, East Sonora, 532-0140. Christian Motorcyclist Association, Sierra Saints Chapter, 8 a.m. breakfast, 9 a.m. ride, My Garden Cafe, 14270 Mono Way, East Sonora, 288-2477. Operation: MOM, a Military Family Support Group, 10 a.m. to 1 p.m., Sonora Veterans Memorial Hall, 9 N. Washington St., 532-8051, 510-329-9397. Family Fire Fest, 11 a.m. to 3 p.m., Mi-Wuk-Sugar Pine Fire Station, 24247 Highway 108, Twain Harte, 588-3319. Friends of the Sierra Railroad, 1 p.m., Bay Avenue and Pine Street, Tuolumne. Walking Dead Sonora Zombie Walk and Food Drive, 4 to 7 p.m., Courthouse Square, Sonora. Second Saturday Art Night, 5 to 8 p.m.; fundraiser dance, 8 to 10 p.m., music by Jank Tones, Coffill Park, Washington Street, downtown Sonora. SUNDAY La Grange Odd Fellows Breakfast 7 to 11 a.m., La Grange Odd Fellows Hall, Main Street, La Grange, 853-2128 or 853-2508. Barrels, Brews & Bites, 2 to 5 p.m., Railtown 1897 State Historic Park, Jamestown. MONDAY Carters Cemetery District Board of Directors, noon, Cemetery Lane, Tuolumne, 928-4867. Tuolumne County Commission on Aging, 1:30 p.m., Area 12 Agency on Aging, 19074 Standard Road, Suite C, Standard. Tuolumne County Genealogical Society, 2 p.m., Tuolumne County Library community room, 532-1317. Tuolumne County Board of Education, 4 p.m., Tuolumne County Superintendent of Schools office, 175 S. Fairview Lane, Sonora. Sonora Planning Commission, 5:30 p.m., City Hall, 94 N. Washington St., Sonora. Tuolumne County Airports Advisory Committee, 6 p.m., cafeteria, Columbia Elementary School, 533-5685. Tuolumne Fire Protection District Board of Directors, 6 p.m., Tuolumne Firehouse, 18650 Main St., Tuolumne, 928-4505. Columbia Volunteer Fire Department Auxiliary, 6:30 p.m., Columbia Firehouse, Jackson and Bigler streets, Columbia. Tuolumne County Farm Bureau Board, 7 p.m., 77 N. Washington St., Sonora, 533-8386. Tuolumne County Genealogical Society, 7 p.m., Tuolumne County Library, community room, 480 Greenley Road, Sonora, 532-1317. Pine Tree Lodge No. 46 I.O.O.F., 8 p.m., Odd Fellows Hall, Bay Avenue, Tuolumne. TUESDAY The Junction Merchants Association, 8:30 a.m., Round Table restaurant, The Junction shopping center, East Sonora. Runaway Bunnies storytime, toddlers ages 2 to 3, 10:30 a.m., Tuolumne County Library, 480 Greenley Road, Sonora, 533-5507. Tuolumne Utilities District Board of Directors, 2 p.m., district office, 18885 Nugget Blvd., off Tuolumne Road. Tuolumne County Child Care Council, 3 to 5 p.m., Tuolumne County Superintendent School’s Office, 175 S. Fairview Lane, Sonora, 533-0377. Friends of the Library Board of Directors, 3:30 p.m., Tuolumne County Library, 480 Greenley Road, Sonora, 533-5507. Columbia Area Advisory Council, 5:30 p.m., Eagle Cotage, Columbia State Historic Park. Columbia School District Board of Trustees, 6 p.m., school, 22540 Parrotts Ferry Road, Columbia, 532-0202. Sonora Cribbage Club, 6 p.m., Tuolumne County Senior Center, 540 Greenley Road, 533-3946. Summerville Elementary School Board of Trustees, 6 p.m., school, 18451 Carter St., Tuolumne, 928-4291. Curtis Creek School District Board of Trustees, 6:15 p.m., district office, 18755 Standard Road, Sonora, 533-1083. Mi-Wuk/Sugar Pine Fire Protection District Board of Directors, 7 p.m., fire station, 24247 Highway 108, Sugar Pine. Vietnam Veterans of America, Chapter No. 391, 7 p.m., Veterans Memorial Hall, 9 N. Washington St., Sonora, 532-2052. Tuolumne County Democratic Club, 7 p.m., Pine Tree Restaurant, Mono Way at 19601 Hess Avenue, East Sonora, 536-0449. CALAVERAS COUNTY TODAY Murphys Historical Walking Tour, 10 a.m., meet Old Timers Museum, Main Street. Snagfallers Ball, 5 p.m. social hour, 6 p.m. dinner, 7 to 10 p.m. dancing, Sierra Nevada Logging Museum, 2148 Dunbar Road, Arnold. SUNDAY Market on the Square, 11 a.m. to 3 p.m., Copperopolis Town Square, Town Square Road, Copperopolis. MONDAY Independence Hall Quilters Guild of Arnold, 9 a.m., Independence Hall, 1445 Blagen Road, White Pines, 795-0619, 795-1833. Greater Arnold Business Association, 6 p.m., Mountain Media, 2182 Highway 4, Arnold. Writers Unlimited, 6:30 to 9 p.m., Arts Council Gallery, 22 Main St., San Andreas. TUESDAY Calaveras County Board of Supervisors, 9 a.m., supervisors chambers, Government Center, 891 Mountain Ranch Road, San Andreas. Jenny Lind Fire Veterans Memorial District, 9 a.m., 189 Pine St., Valley Springs, 772-9650. Storytime for children, 10:30 a.m., Murphys Volunteer Library, 480 Park Lane, Murphys, 728-3036. Calaveras County Farm Bureau, 7 p.m., Grange Hall, 376 Russell Road, San Andreas, 772-3987. Calaveras Public Utility District, 7 p.m., 506 West St. Charles, San Andreas, 754-9442. The Union Democrat Calendar attempts to list all non-commercial events of public interest in the greater Tuolumne and Calaveras county areas. Contributions are welcome. Call 588-4547, visit 84 S.
